languages.text: The target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} equal to {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% of its current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. The latter part of the damage cannot exceed 300.
languages.original_text: Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психический урон{/g}, равный {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% от своего текущего {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Эта прибавка не может превышать 300.

traits.locale_text: The target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} equal to {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% of its current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. The latter part of the damage cannot exceed 300.

The target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300.

The target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300.

languages.text: Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психический урон{/g}, равный {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% от своего текущего {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Эта прибавка не может превышать 300.
languages.original_text: The target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} equal to {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% of its current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. The latter part of the damage cannot exceed 300.

traits.locale_text: Цель получает <u>(уровень посоха псайкера + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера + 30% от текущего запаса{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} цели)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.

Цель получает <u>(уровень посоха псайкера + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера + 30% от текущего запаса{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} цели)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.

languages.text: 目标受到（{uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f}+当前{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的30%）点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。“当前生命值30%”部分的伤害最高不能超过300点。
languages.original_text: The target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} equal to {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% of its current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. The latter part of the damage cannot exceed 300.

traits.locale_text: 目标受到（{uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f}+当前{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的30%）点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。“当前生命值30%”部分的伤害最高不能超过300点。

languages.text: 対象は{uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f}+現在の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の30%に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を受ける。300を超えることはない。
languages.original_text: The target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} equal to {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% of its current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. The latter part of the damage cannot exceed 300.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットは<u>(異能者の杖のパワーレベル + 異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g} + ターゲットの現在の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の30%)</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を受ける。ターゲットの現在の傷の30%に相当する一部ダメージは、300を超えることはない。

languages.text: El objetivo sufre {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} actuales como {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}. La parte del daño igual al 30 % de las heridas actuales del objetivo no puede ser superior a 300.
languages.original_text: The target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} equal to {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% of its current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. The latter part of the damage cannot exceed 300.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo sufre {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} actuales como {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}. La parte del daño igual al 30 % de las heridas actuales del objetivo no puede ser superior a 300.

El objetivo sufre <u>(nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del psíquico + 30 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} actuales del objetivo)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}. La parte del daño igual al 30 % de las heridas actuales del objetivo no puede ser superior a 300.

languages.text: Das Ziel erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} in Höhe von {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30 % seiner aktuellen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}. Letzterer Teil des Schadens kann 300 nicht überschreiten.
languages.original_text: The target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} equal to {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% of its current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. The latter part of the damage cannot exceed 300.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} in Höhe von {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30 % seiner aktuellen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}. Letzterer Teil des Schadens kann 300 nicht überschreiten.

Das Ziel erleidet <u>(Stab-Energiestufe des Psionikers + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Psionikers + 30 % der aktuellen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Ziels)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}. Der Teil des Schadens, der 30 % der aktuellen Wunden des Ziels entspricht, darf 300 nicht übersteigen.

languages.text: La cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} égaux à {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} actuelles. La seconde partie des dégâts ne peut pas dépasser 300 points.
languages.original_text: The target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} equal to {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% of its current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. The latter part of the damage cannot exceed 300.

traits.locale_text: La cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} égaux à {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} actuelles. La seconde partie des dégâts ne peut pas dépasser 300 points.

La cible subit <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Indice psy{/g} du psyker + 30 % des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} actuelles de la cible)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. La part de dégâts égale à 30 % des blessures de la cible ne peut dépasser 300.

languages.text: Hedef, {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + mevcut {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %30'u kadar {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasara{/g} maruz kalır. Hasar değerinin son kısmı 300'ü aşamaz.
languages.original_text: The target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} equal to {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% of its current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. The latter part of the damage cannot exceed 300.

traits.locale_text: Hedef, {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + mevcut {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %30'u kadar {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasara{/g} maruz kalır. Hasar değerinin son kısmı 300'ü aşamaz.

languages.text: The target suffers {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300.

traits.locale_text: The target suffers {uip|Damage1|5b19d80b3d694f77b84c2b38a04efe8f} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300.
